alert.note: Alert for Holt; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 8:26PM CDT until May 07 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Rock County in north central Nebraska... West central Holt County in north central Nebraska... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newport, or 7 miles southeast of Bassett, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atkinson, Stuart, Newport and Pony Lake. This includes Highway 20 between mile markers 262 and 293. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
